item.title: How Foxhole redefines the MMO genre
item.description: When we think about MMOs, the first thought on our minds are MMORPGS like World of Warcraft, Final Fantasy XIV, Guild Wars. all these games are massive multiplayer online games, with hundreds of players connected, adventuring on quests, items, leveling up, all that kind of stuff, Foxhole grabs everything we usually call an MMO and just throws a grenade in the middle of it. Instead of “my character, my loot, my raid”, it’s “our war, our supply lines, our collective screw-up if someone forgets to send supplies to the front lines.

item.title: Exoplanets: Hunting for Earth's Cosmic Cousins
item.description: In the vast tapestry of the cosmos, one of the most intriguing quests of modern astronomy is the search for exoplanets, distant celestial bodies that might bear a resemblance to our own Earth. This endeavor is driven by the tantalizing question: Could there be other habitable worlds out there? In this article, we embark on a journey to explore the captivating hunt for Earth’s cosmic cousins.
